meanings.definition: A person connected by blood or marriage.
meanings.sent1: My relatives came over for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: I have many relatives living in different cities.
meanings.sent3: My relatives always bring the best desserts to family gatherings.
meanings.sent4: The bond between relatives is like a strong tree with deep roots.
meanings.sent5: The love and support of relatives can make tough times easier to bear.

meanings.definition: Something having a relation or connection to something else.
meanings.sent1: The new smartphone model is a relative of the previous version.
meanings.sent2: The color blue is a relative of the color green.
meanings.sent3: In the world of fashion, style trends are relatives that evolve over time.
meanings.sent4: The concept of time being relative to each individual's perception is fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The taste of sweetness is a relative compared to the flavor of saltiness.
